trends: There have been no other sightings in Oak Brook
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Oak Brook,IL attending a book signing event for Nikki Sixx. I was there with my girlfriend Susan. We were waiting outside the Borders Bookstore, specifically the rear which faced West onto Route 83(15th St & Frontage Rd.). I was facing North-Northeast watching the planes take off out of O'Hare Airport. I looked North and saw a round object moving westerly and a leisurely pace. I had my EF 100-300 F4-5.6 lens mounted to my Canon 20D. I set my lens to just over 200mm and set the focus to manual. I know my lens is soft on the focus as it get over 275mm. So I set the focus to be on the center at infinity. I had taken some shots of a nearby building just to check the focus. Originally I thought it was a black plastic bag. It seemed to turn and tumble as it moved. I wish I had my Celestron Regal LS 10X42 binoculars. I know the object was North of Route 56 and probably Route 38. It was had to tell the distance, as I was trying to keep the object in the viewfinder. It appeared to condense and the expand. It seemed to get bright but I believe it was from reflections. I really did not feel excited nor afraid. I just really wanted to capture the image of the object. I have seen some strange lights and objects before but not during the day. I lost sight of the object after about 20 minutes. Before it disappeared it seem to get elongated and seemed to have a lighter appearance. I kept checking the sky for other objects but found nothing.
